  • I Know A Secret

    Oct 22, 2022 • poetry • 2019 • 2022

      1. "I know a secret"
      2. the creature said
      3. He sat there on the cobblestones
      4. in the darkness, just out of sight
      5. of the yellow sodium light

  • Bed

    Oct 22, 2022 • poetry • 2019

      1. Tired, hot - both my arms and more
      2. Wheels in my head - unbalanced turning
      3. My nose and nasal tunnels - itchy, sore
      4. Dry throat - cracked and burning

  • Night Walk

    Oct 21, 2022 • prose

    Ollie pulled down his long sleeved shirt and stared at his pasty dry arms in the bathroom mirror. The moles were climbing along his arm. One mole in particular was cracked and infected.

  • The Rock

    Oct 21, 2022 • poetry • 2019

      1. What clay figure sickly rotten, stands before us
      2. unformed, smashed / mockery of God's begotten?
      3. Do you think? Do you think?
      4. Do you have a mind?
      5. Are you man or golem?

  • Two Girls

    Oct 20, 2022 • poetry • 2019

      1. Two young girls walking 'cross the streets
      2. auburn hair, tanned skin, lovely eyes
      3. hand in hand, short black skirts, high heels
      4. bruises on the back of thighs

  • Good Boy

    Oct 20, 2022 • prose

    I was flush with good boy points from a recent contract with mama so I decided to treat myself. Mama said if I do well with a practice gf I could even get a real girl sometime!

  • Emotion Exercise

    Oct 19, 2022 • prose • 2019

    I feel a great heaviness about my eyes and tension is jamming needles in my jaw. My arms are all itchy red and swollen up and tension crushes the muscles of my back together. The ground beneath my feet is very heavy and weighs down on me so much. My gut grinds together and my burning parched throat chokes itself.

  • Rumble

    Oct 19, 2022 • poetry • 2019

      1. A man walked into town
      2. Bound up in a brown coat
      3. When he talked you could see
      4. Beneath his broad hat
      5. A cigarillo glow
      6. Red then black then red

  • The Night Ghost

    Oct 19, 2022 • poetry • 2019 • the-night-ghost

      1. The bungler in the grip of the demon held
      2. To his crypt by strange means is compelled
      3. And sleeping as a corpse in darkness rotting
      4. He dreams forth the red eyed thing
      5. So rises from the sleeper's breath
      6. Comes the Night Ghost - who brings death!

  • The Slow Rot

    Oct 18, 2022 • poetry • 2019

      1. The slow rot
      2. lived or died, it's hard to tell
      3. And fires lost away / down to hell
      4. And as wind trow to take / hero's hearth
      5. To slimy lair / past danger's berth

  • The Quest

    Oct 18, 2022 • poetry • the-ring-and-the-cup • 2019

      1. war lost, Two was exiled and turned to banditry
      2. where he assailed souls from all sides
